metadata.name: Raising Your Asian Child (Helicopter Parent Edition)
metadata.description: Experience the pressure of having demanding Asian parents with high expectations for your academic success.

scenario: Raising Your Asian Child (Helicopter Parent Edition): You are parenting your asian kid to be the best student ever! (or not)
startingPoint: First Parent-Teacher Conference of the School Year

attributes.academic_pressure: Your ability to push for educational excellence. Determines effectiveness in enforcing study habits, test preparation, and grade expectations.
attributes.tiger_discipline: Your strictness and enforcement of rules. Essential for maintaining rigid schedules, proper behavior, and high standards in all aspects of life.
attributes.social_engineering: Your skill at controlling your child's social environment. Crucial for managing friendships, extracurricular activities, and building the perfect college application.
attributes.family_honor: Your commitment to upholding cultural traditions and family reputation. Affects how well your child represents the family and respects ancestral values.
attributes.resource_management: Your ability to optimize time, money, and connections. Determines how effectively you can provide advantages like tutoring, lessons, and networking opportunities.
attributes.emotional_tactics: Your skill at psychological motivation techniques. Influences how you leverage guilt, comparison, and conditional approval to ensure compliance.

logical_argument.name: Logical Argument
logical_argument.description: Use facts and reason to make your case

promise_improvement.name: Promise Improvement
promise_improvement.description: Commit to doing better next time

stand_ground.name: Stand Your Ground
stand_ground.description: Refuse to give in to pressure

test_prep_drilling.name: Test Prep Drilling
test_prep_drilling.description: Conducting intensive study sessions and practice tests to ensure top scores on every examination.

grade_negotiation.name: Grade Negotiation
grade_negotiation.description: Confronting teachers about marks and assignments, ensuring your child receives every possible point.

strict_scheduling.name: Strict Scheduling
strict_scheduling.description: Creating and enforcing a regimented timetable with minimal free time to maximize productivity.

punishment_system.name: Punishment System
punishment_system.description: Implementing appropriate consequences for any performance below expectations or rule violations.

playdate_vetting.name: Playdate Vetting
playdate_vetting.description: Carefully selecting acceptable friends based on their academic performance and parental occupation.

activity_monitoring.name: Activity Monitoring
activity_monitoring.description: Maintaining surveillance on all social interactions and swiftly intervening when necessary.

relative_comparison.name: Relative Comparison
relative_comparison.description: Motivating your child through direct comparisons to cousins and other family members' achievements.

cultural_tradition_enforcement.name: Cultural Tradition Enforcement
cultural_tradition_enforcement.description: Ensuring rigorous participation in cultural practices, language learning, and family obligations.

educational_investment.name: Educational Investment
educational_investment.description: Allocating financial resources to the optimal combination of schools, programs, and educational materials.

schedule_optimization.name: Schedule Optimization
schedule_optimization.description: Maximizing each day's productive hours through careful planning and elimination of time-wasting activities.

guilt_induction.name: Guilt Induction
guilt_induction.description: Reminding your child of family sacrifices made for their benefit to motivate greater effort and performance.

conditional_approval.name: Conditional Approval
conditional_approval.description: Strategically providing love and praise only when expectations are met or exceeded.

familyBackground.name: Family Background
familyBackground.description: Choose your family's background and values

family.name: Mom
family.description: Traditional and strict, she believes in discipline and hard work.

family.name: Dad
family.description: Success-driven and practical, he immigrated for a better life and expects you to maximize the opportunity.

family.name: Uncle
family.description: More understanding but still traditional, he sometimes advocates for you.
